languages.text: "Хочешь задеть меня? Старайся лучше. Я слыхал издевки и похуже в свой адрес. Зачастую, они становились последними словами произнесших их еретиков".
"If you want to rile me, try harder. I've heard worse taunts. They were usually the last words of a heretic."
languages.original_text: "Хочешь задеть меня? Старайся лучше. Я слыхал издевки и похуже в свой адрес. Зачастую, они становились последними словами произнесших их еретиков".

traits.locale_text: "If you want to rile me, try harder. I've heard worse taunts. They were often the last thing that particular heretic ever said."
"If you want to rile me, try harder. I've heard worse taunts. They were often the last thing that particular heretic ever said."
"If you want to rile me, try harder. I've heard worse taunts. They were often the last thing that particular heretic ever said."
"If you want to rile me, try harder. I've heard worse taunts. They were often the last thing that particular heretic ever said."
"If you want to rile me, try harder. I've heard worse taunts. They were usually the last words of a heretic."
"If you want to rile me, try harder. I've heard worse taunts. They were usually the last words of a heretic."

languages.text: “如果你打算惹火我的话，那你得再加把劲。比这更难听的嘲笑我也听过，而且那往往是那群异端分子最后的遗言。”
languages.original_text: "If you want to rile me, try harder. I've heard worse taunts. They were usually the last words of a heretic."

traits.locale_text: “如果你打算惹火我的话，那你得再加把劲。比这更难听的嘲笑我也听过，而且那往往是那群异端分子最后的遗言。”

languages.text: 「本当に我を怒らせたいのでしたら、もっと努力することですね。もっと酷い嘲笑を聞いたことなどいくらでもあります。大体は、異端者の最後の言葉でしたが」
languages.original_text: "If you want to rile me, try harder. I've heard worse taunts. They were usually the last words of a heretic."

traits.locale_text: 「本当に我を怒らせたいのでしたら、もっと努力することですね。もっと酷い嘲笑を聞いたことなどいくらでもあります。大体は、異端者の最後の言葉でしたが」

languages.text: «Si quiere irritarme tendrá que esforzarse más. He oído peores burlas. Solían ser las últimas palabras de un hereje».
languages.original_text: "If you want to rile me, try harder. I've heard worse taunts. They were usually the last words of a heretic."

traits.locale_text: «Si quiere irritarme tendrá que esforzarse más. He oído peores burlas. Solían ser las últimas palabras de un hereje».

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr mich provozieren wollt, müsst Ihr Euch schon mehr anstrengen. Ich habe schon schlimmere Provokationen gehört. Das waren üblicherweise die letzten Worte eines Ketzers."
languages.original_text: "If you want to rile me, try harder. I've heard worse taunts. They were usually the last words of a heretic."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr mich provozieren wollt, müsst Ihr Euch schon mehr anstrengen. Ich habe schon schlimmere Provokationen gehört. Sie waren oft das Letzte, was der jeweilige Ketzer jemals gesagt hat."

languages.text: « Si vous espérez me provoquer, il va falloir faire mieux que ça. J'ai déjà entendu bien pire, généralement de la part d'hérétiques sur le point de mourir. »
languages.original_text: "If you want to rile me, try harder. I've heard worse taunts. They were usually the last words of a heretic."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous espérez me provoquer, il va falloir faire mieux que ça. J'ai déjà entendu bien pire, généralement de la part d'hérétiques sur le point de mourir. »

languages.text: "Beni kızdırmaya çalışıyorsan çaban yetersiz. Daha kötülerini de duydum. Ekseriyetle kâfirlerin son sözleriydiler."
languages.original_text: "If you want to rile me, try harder. I've heard worse taunts. They were usually the last words of a heretic."
